user.title: Tedee Cloud API
user.description: Enter your Tedee Personal Access Key. You can create one at https://portal.tedee.com/ under Personal Access Keys.

select_lock.title: Select Lock
select_lock.description: Choose the lock you want to add.

ble_address.title: BLE Address
ble_address.description: Automatic scan did not find lock {serial}. Make sure the lock is nearby and awake (touch it), then enter the MAC address manually. You can find it in the Tedee app under lock settings.

register.title: Registering
register.description: Generating keys and registering with Tedee cloud...

error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key. Check your Personal Access Key.
error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to Tedee Cloud API.
error.no_locks_found: No locks found on your Tedee account.
error.invalid_mac: Invalid MAC address. Use format XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX.
error.scan_failed: Bluetooth scan did not find the lock. Make sure it is nearby and awake. Enter the address manually below.

abort.all_locks_configured: All locks on this account are already configured.
abort.registration_failed: Registration with Tedee cloud failed. Check the logs for details.
